name: Arktos XII - Chronochasm Vaylantz
text:
[ Monster Effect ]
2 Level 5 or higher "Vaylantz" monsters
Must first be Special Summoned (from your face-down Extra Deck) by Tributing the above cards.
(Quick Effect): You can switch the locations of 2 monsters in your Main Monster Zones or 2 monsters in your opponent's Main Monster Zones.
If a card in the Monster Zone moves to another Monster Zone (except during the Damage Step): You can destroy 1 card on the field.
You can only use each effect of "Arktos XII - Chronochasm Vaylantz" once per turn.
pendulum_text:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
You can activate 1 of these effects;
● Special Summon this card to your Main Monster Zone in its same column.
● Move 1 monster in your Main Monster Zone to an adjacent (horizontal) Monster Zone.
You can only use this effect of "Arktos XII - Chronochasm Vaylantz" once per turn.
